str2: A companion, comrade, friend. From etes; a comrade.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.
From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A marriage, wedding, wedding-ceremony; plur: a wedding-feast. Of uncertain affinity; nuptials.
A garment, raiment, clothing. From enduo; apparel.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To muzzle, silence. From phimos; to muzzle.
